channel.title: Change the mount of damage that npcs deal
channel.description:
i've solved my npc dont hit problem, but now they only hit 0. even if i attack king black dragon without any armour i still dont lose any hp, how can i put my damage high?
again, i used doomscape as an base, you can find my server at vayle.tk

item.title: Change the mount of damage that npcs deal
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

go to npchandler.java and search for like “hitDiff = misc.random” look for your npc id there and change the hit difference.

Read full topic
item.source: Change the mount of damage that npcs deal
